unnormalised: Hey, interesting read on training regimens! It reminds me of when my cousin, Rohan, prepped for the Mumbai Marathon.
normalised: Hey, interesting read on training regimens! It reminds me of when my cousin, Rohan, prepped for the Mumbai Marathon.

unnormalised: He went from running 5 km to 25 km in just 3 months under Dr. Sharma's guidance.
normalised: He went from running five kilometer to twenty five kilometer in just three months under Doctor Sharma's guidance.

unnormalised: His flat is tiny, only 400 sq ft but he did a lot of core work there. Discipline!
normalised: His flat is tiny, only four hundred square feet but he did a lot of core work there. Discipline!

unnormalised: Proper diet is key too, avoiding all that sugary Diwali mithai!
normalised: Proper diet is key too, avoiding all that sugary Diwali mithai!

unnormalised: Now he runs marathons to raise money, Rs. 5000 per km, for his old school.
normalised: Now he runs marathons to raise money, rupees five thousand per kilometer, for his old school.

unnormalised: Amazing transformation, isn't it? What's your favorite training tip?
normalised: Amazing transformation, isn't it? What's your favorite training tip?
